items.sentence: Tom just happens to think his birthplace, Boston, is the best city in the world.
Tom isn't the only one that has to study really hard. I have to study hard, too.
As Tom and Mary spent time together, they began to get to know each other better.
Tom told Mary that it wasn\'t a good idea to have money just sitting in the bank.
Tom thought the teacher had given him way too much homework to finish in one day.
